name: aeproject-project
description: This is the default package.json generated for your project

scripts.build: npm run build:circuit && npm run build:circuit:afterSetup
scripts.build:circuit:compile: circom circuits/withdraw.circom --prime BLS12381 --r1cs --wasm --sym && npx snarkjs info -c withdraw.r1cs
scripts.build:circuit:preSetup: npx snarkjs ptn bls12-381 16 pot16_0000.ptau -v && npx snarkjs ptc pot16_0000.ptau pot16_0001.ptau --name="Jeevanjot Singh Vital" -v
scripts.build:circuit:setup: npm run build:circuit:preSetup && npx snarkjs pt2 pot16_0001.ptau pot16_final.ptau -v && npx snarkjs g16s withdraw.r1cs pot16_final.ptau withdraw_0000.zkey
scripts.build:circuit:afterSetup: npm run build:circuit:setup && npx snarkjs zkc withdraw_0000.zkey withdraw_0001.zkey --name="Jeevanjot Singh Vital" -v && npm run build:circuit:export_key
scripts.build:circuit:export_key: npx snarkjs zkev withdraw_0001.zkey withdraw_0001_verification_key.zkey.json && npm run build:contract
